metadata.name: The Corruption of OG Astro
metadata.description:
"Many months deep in the metaverse has started to warp reality for OG_Astro.  A thick shiny lustre has formed over the pixels. Lights crackle and fizz as they burn through into the skin - All things in time will be devoured."   

This is the first piece in a series exploring the dynamic interaction between art and the new digital territories. There's been a steep learning curve for artists as they explore this new landscape. Language has changed, commerce has changed, art has irrevocably altered its trajectory. The OG has been corrupted. Those evolving pressures are represented here in a surrealist fashion, the acid etched form of the OG-Astro surrounded by tomes of the zeitgeist. This is the first chapter in a new story.  

Ultra high resolution, loopable video with original score. 42 seconds.
